items.title: [Quesnel Cariboo Observer] FOREST OPERATIONS MAP ‚Äì INVITATION TO COMMENT
items.content_html: The public is invited to review and comment on this Forest Operations Map (FOM). The FOM shows proposed cut block development and proposed road construction under the listed Forest Stewardship Plan (FSP) within Forest Development Units in the Quesnel Natural Resource District. The FOM has a validity period of 3 years beginning February 18, 2026. During the validity period, the licensee may apply for cutting permits containing cut blocks and apply for road permits to construct roads shown on their FOM.
